resources.string: Do you want to close the application?
This is a social app where you can donate resources to someone that really need it.
Become a donor and you will have the opportunity to see profiles of people in need and help them.
Be a volunteer and help to register and manage the profiles of people that need help.
If you have a Liquid Galaxy System installed you can view all this info into a spectacular panoramic screens.
You also can continue with Google:
Here you can access the Liquid Galaxy System:
This user already exists!Choose another name.
Enter a valid username. Username must have at least 4 characters
Introduce a valid password.Password must have at least 6 characters
You have to fill this field
What can you do if you register as volunteer?

1. You can connect with people without resources who need our help 

 2. You can create and manage profiles for them, since they do not always have a mobile phone connected to the Internet 

 3. You can help to make the donation delivery in case the donors do not have the possibility to do it personally
What can you do if you register as a donor?

1. You can help people without basic resources such as food, accommodation or clothing 

 2. You can choose the profile of the person who most attracts your attention and help them 

 3. You can donate food, clothing, accommodation, work or personal hygiene products 

 4. You can deliver the aid personally or with the help of a volunteer
Thank you. Please check your email to activate your account.
I agree the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy
You have to agree the Terms and conditions first!
Thank you. Please check your email to activate your account.
The email field is not valid or is empty
To reset your password, enter the email address you use to login to HAPIS.
An email has been sent to the supplied email address.\nFollow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
Fail to send reset password email!\nCheck that the email is correct
This button will let the volunteer edit the shown fields of the homeless
With this button the homeless profile will be deleted
Go on the floating menu and select\n New homeless profile\n to create your first homeless profile.
Your generous support provide real people with things like food and helps us to continue with this application.
Watch a 30 seconds video to donate €0.40.
SMS is required on this number
Change your existing phone number or add a new one
You changed your phone number successfully. Next time you login you can see your new phone number on your profile info.
You have successfully sent your message.\n We\'ll revert back to you as soon as possible.
You have successfully sent your message.\n We\'ll revert back to you as soon as possible to the registered email address.
This field can not be empty!
Before you start creating the profile, read the following terms and privacy policy to the homeless persona and make sure that he/she understand it and gives his/her consent with the signature.

1. Next, the volunteer will ask you for some personal information in order to create your profile, so that people will better understand your situation and be able to help you 

2. You will not be asked for your real name, but a username that will be visible to donors 

3. You can add a photo of yourself to the profile, but it is not required. 

4. You will be asked for your birth date,your phone number, a short story from your life and what you need most right now. 

5. You will have to specify the location and a time in which you can be found in said location. This information is used by people who want to donate something to hand things over to you.

6. All the data provided will be used only so that people know you better in order to help you and at no time will it be transferred to third parties.
Sign has been successfully saved!You can continue with the register
Information successfully saved!You can continue with register
Cannot write images to external storage
I agree the terms and conditions
To confirm enter the first and last name of the person who signed.

will be added to our statistics

You have to select a date!
You have to select an hour!
You have to select the location!
Did you delivered this donation to homeless?
This app has been developed thanks to Intership students as a new application from GSoC 2020 Project
Developed thanks to TIC Laboratories of the Scientific Park of Lleida and Liquid Galaxy LAB

Error connecting with Liquid Galaxy. Please, try changing settings.
Error connecting with Liquid Galaxy system. Try changing username, password, port or the host ip
Removed all HAPIS info from Liquid Galaxy
This is necessary when you first use the application with the Liquid Galaxy.\n This allows you to see all the information on the screens.
By this you delete all information and requirements of HAPIS into the Liquid Galaxy.
You can find the complete guide of HAPIS in HAPIS Wiki
Connect to the Liquid Galaxy for the first time

To connect with the Liquid Galaxy for the first time follow the next steps:
 1.In the menu select Setting. Here, complete the LG user, password, IP and port. The port normally is 22.
 2. In Advanced Setting you can find 5 options.Here, you can select which is the slave screen where you want to see that info.
 3. Go back to main dashboard and select Tools on the menu.
 4. In Tools select the menu option Install and press OK button. This way you install all the requirements into the Liquid Galaxy master.
 5. If you want to delete all the Hapis related info from the LG master, you just have to select the Uninstall button.

In the main dashboard you have 3 buttons:
 1. Cities: By pressing this button you go to another page where you can see all the cities where we have homeless registerd.
 2. City Statistics: This button flies to each city and shows you the local statistics on Liquid Galaxy.
 3. Global Statistics: This button shows you the statistics for all cities into a single bubble on Liquid Galaxy.

If you select Tools on the menu, you can see 4 buttons:
 1. Clean KML: By pressing this button, you delete all the kmls shown on the Liquid Galaxy. It also cleans the slaves.
 2. Relaunch LG: By pressing this button you make a relaunch of he Liquid Galaxy.
 3. Reboot LG: Makes a reboot of the Liquid Galaxy.
 4. Shutdown LG: This buttons shuts down the Liquid Galaxy.

When you select a city, in the Liquid Galaxy you can see how it flies to the city and on the device you can see four buttons on the dashboard. Next, you can what is doing each of them:
 1. Homeless: Shows you a list of all homeless in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Volunteers:Shows you a list of all volunteers in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 3.Donors: Shows you a list of all donors in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 4.Live Overview: Into the Liquid Galaxy,flies to each city, shows the local statistics on a screen and passes for all homeless, showing the information bubble into another screen.

When you select Homeless on a city, you can see a list of all homeless persons in that city.When you select a homeless username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Life History: Shows the life history too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows the donations that the homeless received.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that homeless.

When you select Volunteers on a city, you can see a list of all volunteers in that city.When you select a volunteer username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Extra: Shows the first name, last name and phone too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows how many homeless profiles he created.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that volunteer.

When you select Donors on a city, you can see a list of all donors in that city.When you select a donor username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Extra: Shows the first name, last name and phone too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows how many donations he realized.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that donor.
Choose the slave where you want to see the logos.
Choose the slave where you want to see the homeless balloon.
Choose the slave where you want to see the local statistics balloon.
Choose the slave where you want to see the global statistics balloon.
Choose the slave where you want to see the live overview homeless balloons.
